TypeSignature.Value: public interface ISQLOutput : Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable
.class public interface auto ansi abstract ISQLOutput implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class System.IDisposable
type ISQLOutput = interface interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable

Docs.summary: The output stream for writing the attributes of a user-defined type back to the database.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
